effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user hits the target with its tail. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also poison the target.
